query:
ALTER TABLE users 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS eventDurationMode ENUM('stop_only', 'include_drive') DEFAULT 'stop_only',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS googleCalendarAccessToken TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS googleCalendarRefreshToken TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS googleCalendarTokenExpiry TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS googleCalendarList TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS calendarPreferences TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS autoArchiveDays INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS schedulingEmail VARCHAR(320),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS enableDateReminders INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS reminderIntervals TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS enabledReminderDateTypes TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS reminderEmail10DaysSubject TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS reminderEmail10DaysBodyContact TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS reminderEmail10DaysBodyTeam TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS reminderEmail5DaysSubject TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS reminderEmail5DaysBodyContact TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS reminderEmail5DaysBodyTeam TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS reminderEmailPastDueSubject TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS reminderEmailPastDueBodyContact TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS reminderEmailPastDueBodyTeam TEXT;

ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS eventDurationMode ENUM('stop_only', 'include_drive') DEFAULT 'stop_only',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS googleCalendarAccessToken TEXT,

ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS autoArchiveDays INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS schedulingEmail VARCHAR(320),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS enableDateReminders INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS reminderIntervals TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS enabledReminderDateTypes TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS reminderEmail10DaysSubject TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS reminderEmail10DaysBodyContact TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS reminderEmail10DaysBodyTeam TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS reminderEmail5DaysSubject TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS reminderEmail5DaysBodyContact TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS reminderEmail5DaysBodyTeam TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS reminderEmailPastDueSubject TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS reminderEmailPastDueBodyContact TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS reminderEmailPastDueBodyTeam TEXT;
